backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including App.tsx, styles, Tailwind config, HTML entry, and SafeImage component.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes with global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with updated favicon assets, metadata, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page with header, navigation, sections, galleries, and SafeImage usage; includes mobile menu and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image wrapper component providing error handling with fallbacks or placeholders to avoid broken images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, status tracking, and logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-driven global stylesheet defining warm industrial color palette, dark mode variables, and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and includes typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, image requirements, and known deployment issues for the Beniwal Music Center website build.
